title: Beverly Hills Zeit0210 6/24: Biden Landslide, Ahmaud Arbery, French Revolution, California
itunes:title: Beverly Hills Zeit0210 6/24: Biden Landslide, Ahmaud Arbery, French Revolution, California
description:
On this edition of Beverly Hills Zeit0210 Jack and Miles discuss people assuming Joe Biden is going to crush Trump due to high poll numbers, the 3 men who murdered Ahmaud Arbery have been indicted, Lindsey Graham is scared of Progressives, and California just had its biggest one day increase in Corona Virus cases.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
